content: Your home holds the most valuable things in your life, so make sure it’s protected with a security system . A camera security system gives you peace of mind as it deters break-ins and allows you to visually monitor what’s happening around your home. Start protecting your home with the Blink XT Home Security camera system, on sale for up to 40% off at Amazon . (The price you pay depends on the number of cameras you want.) Blink XT cameras are weatherproof and work for both indoor and outdoor protection. They have a built-in motion sensor alarm that alerts your smartphone and records a short clip of the triggering event. Don’t worry about the cameras dying on you — they come powered by a two-year Lithium battery. They’re easy to install and data is sent from the cameras to cloud storage or your phone via WiFi. You can view the recorded footage from motion detection or watch live HD video and audio streaming. You have the option to purchase a one, two, three, or five camera system from Blink. The one camera Blink XT system is on sale for $79.99, a savings of $50 . Image: blink home security Take up to 40% off Blink XT Home Security camera systems at Amazon See Details

Blink XT home security camera systems are up to 40% off at Amazon

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Miller KernMashable Deals2019-04-11 15:54:53 UTC

Your home holds the most valuable things in your life, so make sure it’s protected with a security system. A camera security system gives you peace of mind as it deters break-ins and allows you to visually monitor what’s happening around your home.

Start protecting your home with the Blink XT Home Security camera system, on sale for up to 40% off at Amazon. (The price you pay depends on the number of cameras you want.)

Blink XT cameras are weatherproof and work for both indoor and outdoor protection. They have a built-in motion sensor alarm that alerts your smartphone and records a short clip of the triggering event.

Don’t worry about the cameras dying on you — they come powered by a two-year Lithium battery. They’re easy to install and data is sent from the cameras to cloud storage or your phone via WiFi. You can view the recorded footage from motion detection or watch live HD video and audio streaming.

You have the option to purchase a one, two, three, or five camera system from Blink. The one camera Blink XT system is on sale for $79.99, a savings of $50.




Take up to 40% off Blink XT Home Security camera systems at Amazon
